title: The Lost Boys: Steff Cras, and how spectator interference is nothing new at the Tour de France
content:
Throughout this Tour, longtime cycling journalist John Wilcockson is writing about the riders who have to abandon the race: The Lost Boys.

Read the full article at The Lost Boys: Steff Cras, and how spectator interference is nothing new at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
